name: Life is a Ball
description:
Life is a Ball is a narrative game where you need to make life decisions to maintain health, social, wisdom and wealth. The better you can balance these traits, the longer you will live.

  The game contains stats and achievements.

  To start the game, swipe left or right on the ball. 

- Swipe left or right to see actions for each scenario. This will also indicate which stats will be affected by that choice. Release the ball to choose.

- Keep yourself alive by choosing the actions that help keep all of the stats high.
